Subject: Introduction to Kanban Boards
Description: A lean, visual, Just-In-Time software scheduling system. Visual scheduling system, which uses pre-defined units of work as input and displays them in various states of completeness.  Speakers include:Mark Haynes, Douglas Johnson - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: The IT Road Warrior
Description:
What does it take to become an IT Road Warrior? What are the gadgets, luggage, and contract requirements for living life on the road?  Speakers include:Mark Haynes
Douglas Johnson - Track: Tech, Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Teaching Open Source in Schools
Description: There are a lot of computer classes at schools, but they are usually programing with a lot of drinking of Microsoft Kool Aid. There are lots of open source tools out there that can do the same thing for free. This is a introductory level panel.  Speakers include:Douglas Johnson - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Test Driven Development to Write Less Code
Description: Learn how to use test driven development and other agile principles to write less code and bring a more reliable product to market faster. Test Driven Developers write a test, and then write the code to make the test pass. This counter intuitive process ultimately results in writing less code that is more reliable and easier to extend. Intended for someone with a little programming experience, or somebody with a lot who wants to stretch themselves in new areas.  Speakers include:Stephen Cavaliere, Douglas Johnson, Clay Dowling, Scott Favre - Track: Tech  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: How to Get (and Keep) a Tech Job
Description: To get a professional job, you must be adept at phone and Skype screening interviews. Once you get a job, you might be expected to program for 3 browsers plus Android and IOS devices, flawlessly. Or as a tester, you'll want to know mobile testing tools plus the Agile environment. We'll talk about all this, and more!  Speakers include:Mark Haynes, Douglas Johnson - Track: Tech, Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
